flawed_nl_solution:
Two-fifths of 1000 players is (2/5)*1000 = <<(2/5)*1000=400>>400 players
Three eights of 1000 players is (3/8)*1000 = <<(3/8)*1000=8000/3>>8000/3 players
The total number of players 25 or older is 400+8000/3 = <<400+8000/3=9200/3>>9200/3
The number of players younger than 25 years is 1000-9200/3 = <<1000-9200/3=-6200/3>>-6200/3 players
#### -6200/3

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 375, not 8000/3. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
